Lack enough support: The claim lacks evidence or support to prove the existence of the LGBT organization or their endorsement of Atiku Abubakar.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes the existence of the LGBT organization without any proof or prior knowledge of their activities.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there is no record of any statements or activities attributed to the alleged LGBT organizations.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the support of the LGBT community for Atiku Abubakar by falsely attributing endorsements to non-existent organizations.
Falters at times: The claim falters by presenting anonymous representatives and unverified accounts as evidence of LGBT support.
